dependenciesComments.bcrypt: This is used to encypt the password before saving to db
dependenciesComments.body-parser: It's a middleware, extracts the body from the reqest and provide req.body property.
dependenciesComments.express: A framework made on node, made for node.
dependenciesComments.mongoose: A ODM for mongodb, similar to Hibernate in Java
dependenciesComments.mongoose-unique-validator: This is used by mongoose to incorporate the unique field in schema
dependenciesComments.multer: It's a middleware, extacts the input like bytes, upload file data from request
